title: Michelle Belton
text: Well the first guy.that help me didnt have paitents. But I'm glad he sent me to the one who help me pick my funiture and dinning room set i really thank him for being patient with me and i would given him tens all the way through thank You Gardener White for the awesome customer service reps . Love my new funiture as we'll
